articles.author: Alex Conrad
articles.title: PM’s bullish response to Ashes drama
articles.description: Prime Minister Scott Morrison has emphatically declared he would not do any “special deals” to allow the families of travelling English cricketers entry into Australia for the Ashes.
articles.content: Scott Morrison was unflinching when quizzed whether the families of Englands cricketers would be permitted to enter Australia for the Ashes.Prime Minister Scott Morrison has emphatically declared he … [+2895 chars]

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Johnson speaks to Australian PM on Ashes
articles.description: Prime Minister Boris Johnson asks Australian counterpart Scott Morrison to ease coronavirus quarantine rules so that families of England cricketers can travel for this winter's Ashes.
articles.content:
England's Ashes preparations have already been hindered after their fifth Test against India was cancelled earlier in September

articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
